definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane

sentences.english: This was my old haunt, and it's haunted me still.
sentences.chinese: 这是我的故地，它仍然困扰我。

sentences.english: the summer of 1959 was the last Moreno would see of it.
sentences.chinese: 1959年夏天，将是摩惹诺参观故地的最后机会。

sentences.english: Ruan Xin lets return old haunt to rebuild home, lose memory because of the accident however.
sentences.chinese: 阮心让回到故地重建家园，却因意外而丧失记忆。

sentences.english: Revisiting an old haunt is surely exciting.
sentences.chinese: 故地重游嘛，当然兴奋了。

sentences.english: I went back to old familiar places, saw friends and family that it has been too long since our last meetings.
sentences.chinese: 我回到那些熟悉的故地，看到久违谋面的家人朋友。

sentences.english: There are plenty of coins in this lake. Everybody wants to come back again.
sentences.chinese: 这个湖里有很多的钱币，每个人都想故地重游。

sentences.english: When it photographed the same field yesterday, a refugee camp had already sprung up on the grass.
sentences.chinese: 昨天当它故地重游时，草地已经变成了一个难民营。

sentences.english: Dong Yuan activity area is the germination of Landscape Painting Six old haunt.
sentences.chinese: 董源活动的地区正是六朝萌发山水画的故地。

sentences.english: The one, who will visit this spa once, shall be back here again.
sentences.chinese: 一旦来此温泉度假，必定会故地重游。

sentences.english: Liu town with ginger dusk when smoke revisit pastly unmanned island.
sentences.chinese: 柳时镇带着姜暮烟重游故地无人岛。

sentences.english: No time to re-visit these sites and replenish our spirits.
sentences.chinese: 没有时间故地重游，去充实我们的精神世界。

sentences.english: Years after the fall of the Berlin Wall, he returned to the same sites, camera in hand.
sentences.chinese: 后来柏林墙倒塌，数年后，他带着相机故地重游。

definition: (lit.) leftover men/(fig.) loyalist adherents of a former dynasty/surviving members of an ethnic group
lit. to return east/fig. to return to one's homeland
old site/site of sth (palace, ancient state etc) that no longer exists
Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
Western Regions (Han Dynasty term for regions beyond Yumen Pass 玉門關|玉门关[Yu4 men2 Guan1])
Inner Mongolia (lit. south of the Gobi Desert)
Central Plain, the middle and lower regions of the Yellow river, including Henan, western Shandong, southern Shanxi and Hebei
